title: Foxworth Friday: NFL Playoff Primer
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the NFL Playoff matchups that they are most excited for, including Cowboys-49ers (12:29), Rams-Cardinals (35:40) and Patriots-Bills (41:30). Plus, the “mall bartering system” (1:40) and why Al Davis is the "most interesting" figure in the history of the league (27:25).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
